name: node-redis-keychain
description: A Node.js library for streamlining the configuration and maintenance of your Redis namespace

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test `npm bin`/istanbul cover `npm bin`/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Adriano Di Giovanni <me@adrianodigiovanni.com> (http://adrianodigiovanni.com/)
